attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.title: worst app i have ever downloaded!!
attributes.review: i am absolutely disgusted with this app. it shouldn’t even be available in the app store anymore. when i downloaded this app it completely messed up my phone; it made it glitch, turn off, go black, anything you can think of! if i could i would give this app zero stars!!

attributes.title: rip pap😔😢
attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded the app...MY PAP DIED! idk he just fell and stopped breathing. i spoke with him through the ouiji board thing and he said he died because i downloaded the app🙁rip pap you will be missed😰

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: This app has ruined my life, it killed my wife  children and dog from the micro wave signals it sends throughout the speaker please spread awareness so more incidents like this don’t happen to anyone else.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!
attributes.review: This took weeks to download!! For some reason when i opened the app there was a video of donald trump singing straight out of Compton , this made me and my daughter Tesla VERY VERY uncomfortable!! Absolutely horrible!!!! LET ME SPEAK TO THE MANAGER NOW!!!
